selectStatements.query:
SELECT
    'INVENTORY BU'            driving_dim_code,
    business_unit_name   dimension_value,
TO_CHAR(business_unit_id) dimension_value_code
FROM
      dw_business_unit_d_tl a
WHERE language = 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.USER_LANGUAGE_CODE)'
 and  EXiSTS (
        SELECT 1 
          FROM dw_inv_organization_d x
         WHERE x.inv_business_unit_id = a.business_unit_id)
